body.p: 1. Resident of Kiriath-jearim to whose home the ark of God was brought on its return by the Philistines (1 Sm 6:21–7:2).
2. Jesse’s second son, and brother of David (1 Sm 16:8; 17:13; 1 Chr 2:13). This Abinadab served in Saul’s army for part of the Philistine war.
3. KJV form of Ben-abinadab, one of King Solomon’s administrative officers in 1 Kings 4:11. See Ben-abinadab.
